history.proof: intros me st client id c. unfold update_elections_data_client_request. destruct (handleClientRequest me (snd st) client id c) as [[out st'] ps]. destruct (length (log (snd st)) <? length (log st')) eqn:H. - destruct (log st') eqn:LogCases. + reflexivity. + reflexivity. - reflexivity.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface

Goal:
forall (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), votesWithLog (update_elections_data_client_request me st client id c) = votesWithLog (fst st)

Record electionsData (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkElectionsData { votes : list (term * name); votesWithLog : list (term * name * list entry); cronies : term -> list name; leaderLogs : list (term * list entry); allEntries : list (term * entry) } Arguments electionsData {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkElectionsData {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope

```coq
intros me st client id c.
unfold update_elections_data_client_request.
destruct (handleClientRequest me (snd st) client id c) as [[out st'] ps].
destruct (length (log (snd st)) <? length (log st')) eqn:H.
